snippet: New books include Daniel Oppenheimer’s “Exit Right: The People Who Left the Left and ­Reshaped the American Century.”
abstract: Amy Finnerty reviews books Exit Right: The People Who Left the Left and Reshaped the American Century by Daniel Oppenheimer, History's People: Personalities and the Past by Margaret MacMillan, Children of Monsters: An Inquiry Into the Sons and Daughters of Dictators by Jay Nordlinger and Andy Warhol Was a Hoarder: Inside the Minds of History’s Great Personalities by Claudia Kalb.
lead_paragraph: New books include Daniel Oppenheimer’s “Exit Right: The People Who Left the Left and ­Reshaped the American Century.”
